scripts.dev:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --watch --root-mode upward --out-dir cjs --source-maps --extensions .ts,.tsx --delete-dir-on-start --no-comments
scripts.bulid:rollup: cross-env NODE_ENV=production modulePath=core input=src/index.ts rollup -m -c ../../rollup/dev.config.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production modulePath=core input=src/index.ts rollup -c ../../rollup/prod.config.js
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --root-mode upward --out-dir cjs --source-maps --extensions .ts,.tsx --delete-dir-on-start --no-comments
scripts.build:esm: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --root-mode upward --out-dir esm --source-maps --extensions .ts,.tsx --delete-dir-on-start --no-comments
scripts.generate:docs: typedoc --out docs --target es6 --theme minimal --mode file src
